comment.author: 52682399@N07
comment._content:
The Charlie Ventura Quintet played at the Three Deuces from  April early until June early.
The bassist is not Curly Russell. It is probably Chubby Jackson.
(Billboard, April 12, 1947: 32: Ad from the Moss agency: Charlie Ventura Quintet now at the Three Deuces in New York)
.("Ventura, Harris Split, Found Own Units,” Down Beat, May 21, 1947: 1)
